entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is described as the matron who is kept busy by a sudden spate of colds among the staff and students. She is also mentioned to have created a potion called Pepperup Potion.

entities.name: pepperup potion
entities.description: Pepperup Potion is described as working instantly, but leaving the drinker smoking at the ears for several hours afterwards. It was created by Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is described as looking peaky and being bullied into taking some Pepperup Potion by Percy. She has vivid hair that gives the impression of her whole head being on fire when she takes the potion.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as bullying Ginny Weasley into taking some Pepperup Potion.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's pumpkins are mentioned to have swelled to the size of garden sheds due to the rain.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is described as having enthusiasm for regular training sessions, which is why Harry was found returning to Gryffindor Tower late one stormy Saturday afternoon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned to be returning to Gryffindor Tower late one stormy Saturday afternoon, drenched to the skin.
